name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a seasoned Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience, I have honed my skills in building robust and secure back-end systems specializing in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Spring Core**. I excel in designing RESTful APIs and implementing **Spring Security** features, including **OAuth2** and **JWT** for secure authentication. My expertise in **CI/CD** practices ensures seamless integration and deployment processes, while my proficiency in **Azure**, particularly **Azure DevOps**, and **Kubernetes** enhances application scalability and management.

I bring a strong foundation in software architecture patterns such as Dependency Injection and Inversion of Control, along with a commitment to adhering to security best practices outlined by **OWASP**. My background includes extensive experience with database management and data access strategies using **SQL** and **Cosmos DB**. Additionally, I've contributed to developing enterprise-level solutions in healthcare and finance sectors, focusing on microservices and event-driven system architectures. Leveraging my knowledge of cloud technologies and back-end frameworks, I aim to deliver high-performance solutions that meet compliance standards.
